pr_title: Added support for furnaces and brewing stands to cargo nets.

timeline.bodyText: Why did you not return null there?
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.bodyText: I originally had a really bad system where I moved that to another method and that was the only way I could figure out if the item was placed fully or not placed at all. Should functionally be the same, but replaced it with a null anyways.
replies.author: BigBadE

timeline.message: Added support for furnaces and brewing stands to cargo nets.
